title: Hiring Safety Status

safe.title: Safe Hire
safe.description: Tested downside scenarios stay outside layoff and payroll breach thresholds.

risky.title: Risky Hire
risky.description: A moderate downside pushes you into the layoff zone within {{months}} months.

dangerous.title: Dangerous Hire
dangerous.description: Risk of cash breach under realistic downside within {{months}} months.

timeline.title: Time to Risk Events (Stress Outcome)
timeline.noEvents: No risk events within {{months}} months (under tested downside)
timeline.pinsNote: Note: Pins mark threshold crossings under tested downside
timeline.stressTestNote: Note: This is a stress test outcome over a 6-month horizon - not a point forecast.
timeline.layoffSubtitle: - runway < 3 months OR bench > 25% for 2 months

failureLadder.title: Failure Ladder (What breaks first, and why)
failureLadder.whatBreaksFirstExplanation: Utilization softness creates a bench, then cash pressure. Layoffs appear before insolvency.
failureLadder.breakpointsExplanation: Below ~70% utilization for 2 months OR a 30-day delay from the top client triggers the layoff zone.
failureLadder.defaultAction: Proceed. Keep an eye on utilization and payment discipline, but no immediate constraints appear.

zones.risky: Risky = enters layoff zone (runway below 3 months OR bench > 25% for 2 months).

disclaimer: This is an approximate model designed for decision robustness. It does not provide financial advice or precise forecasts.
demoNote: Demo flow: 3x verdict (Risk Zones) - 30s horizon check (Timeline) - 2-5m why (Failure Ladder).
